tweets.text: It is 2.30am and the stench that is @RedIndustries2 landfill Whalley's Quarry is permeating our whole flat. This is an environment disaster, a major public and mental health risk. Awake again, and both of us have work tom. @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency #StopTheStink

@renton_phil @WandleForum @Feargal_Sharkey @alison_fure @BerrylandsNR @BenGoldsmith @CitizenZoo @LivingWandle @battersea_arts @MjTurner_ @MordenHallPkNT @thameswater @SE_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgency It's the treated effluent from Beddington yes. But, it generally comes out clearer than that. 
Is this murky flow a breach of permit?

@paulconnor23 @eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 I ask myself this everyday, poor regulation from @EnvAgency total mismanagement from @RedIndustries2 in fact a failure to even recognise the landfill is the cause of the stink & now the health concerns grow... it‚Äôs like living in the 1800‚Äôs #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe
@eddiemair @darrenadam @TomSwarbrick1 how can this be allowed to happen ?? https://t.co/9j1w5wtNfC

Don't know the full details but alleged 'work' carried out by @EnvAgency for caravan park at Coalport, Shropshire. Before and after shots. Total destruction during nesting season üò°
@Feargal_Sharkey @ChrisGPackham @TheRiverSevern @severnrivers @ShropsWildlife https://t.co/xrAMIjW7E1

We are currently investigating a pollution incident at the Cotting Burn in #Morpeth. 

We‚Äôve taken water quality samples and are carrying out further enquiries. 

Pollution incidents can be reported to us on 0800 807060. https://t.co/cMLK9i470D
